      • Shot

        public Shot(Position position,
            SpriteSheet sprite,
            int lifeTake)
        Shot class default constructor. Type set to its default value -> TYPE_NORMAL.
        Parameters:
        position - Position on screen
        sprite - Shot sprite representation.
        lifeTake - Life it takes from the object that collides with it.
